definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: This is a car race near our town every year. In1995, there was a …
sentences.chinese: 这是一场汽车角逐在我们镇子四周每年都有。

sentences.english: It was still pitch-dark when I started off from Delamu Inn.
sentences.chinese: 早上从德拉姆客栈出发时，四周还是漆黑一团。

sentences.english: The soldiers began to search the houses round about, and to pursue the fugitives .
sentences.chinese: 士兵们开始搜查四周的房屋并追捕逃亡者。

sentences.english: The barber looks around the shop and says, "About 2 hours."
sentences.chinese: 理发室看了看四周，说，“大约两个小时。”

sentences.english: Even if the whole universe are black, I would also like to use my face around to kindle.
sentences.chinese: 就算全宇宙都是黑色的，我也要用我的笑容燃亮四周。

sentences.english: The farmers tamped down the earth around the base of the seedings .
sentences.chinese: 农民们把幼苗基部四周的泥土压实。

sentences.english: Nothing can describe the peace that surrounded the country parsonage.
sentences.chinese: 乡村的牧师住宅，四周静谧得难以名状。

sentences.english: Around the sword light quickly gathered, the sword is pointing at me.
sentences.chinese: 四周的剑光又迅速聚来，刀剑皆指向我。

sentences.english: All the hangings enclosing the court were of fine twined linen.
sentences.chinese: 庭院四周所有的帷幔，都是用捻的细麻编成的。

sentences.english: The building which stands near the train station is a supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 位于火趁魅站四周的那座年夜楼是一家超市。

sentences.english: And keep hand sanitizer around and use frequently.
sentences.chinese: 四周放些洗手液，经常使用。

sentences.english: As if unsure of where he is, she hesitated and looked around.
sentences.chinese: 她仿佛茫然不知声身在何处，犹豫地向四周打量。

sentences.english: Fire and wind raged all around, snapping juniper trees and incinerating the sagebrush.
sentences.chinese: 四周风火肆虐，猛咬着杜松树，把山艾树烧成了灰烬。

sentences.english: The house was shut in by trees.
These are walls much, much larger than the ones that surround my cell.
sentences.chinese: 这是比围在我牢房四周的墙壁还要厚得多多的墙壁。

sentences.english: The fire is sprawling in all directions.
